statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} - x^{2} + 3 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} + x^{2} - 6 \, x - 4 , 3 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 9 \, x - 12 , 3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 1 , 7 \, x^{3} + 7 \, x^{2} - 21 \, x - 28\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
